metadata.title: CVE-2018-7409 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In unixODBC before 2.3.5, there is a buffer overflow in theunicode_to_ansi_copy() function in DriverManager/__info.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libodbc1 - 2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3
odbcinst - 2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3
odbcinst1debian2 - 2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3
unixodbc - 2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unixodbc package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3').
